abstract: The company, perhaps to forestall objections on privacy grounds, said it planned to give users the ability to access their profiles.
snippet: The company, perhaps to forestall objections on privacy grounds, said it planned to give users the ability to access their profiles.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Google will begin showing ads on Wednesday to people based on their previous online activities in a form of advertising known as behavioral targeting, which has been embraced by most of its competitors but has drawn criticism from privacy advocates and some members of Congress.

headline.main: Google to Offer Ads Based on Interests
headline.print_headline: Google to Offer Ads Based on Interests, With Privacy Rights

abstract: Google has repriced 7.64 million stock options that had become less likely to enrich its employees given the sharp decline in the Internet search leader’s market value during the past 16 months, The Associated Press said.
lead_paragraph: Google has repriced 7.64 million stock options that had become less likely to enrich its employees given the sharp decline in the Internet search leader’s market value during the past 16 months, The Associated Press said.

headline.main: Google Reprices 7.6 Million Employee Stock Options

abstract: Google Voice has breathed new life into GrandCentral, a service that lets all your phones respond to one number.
snippet: Google Voice has breathed new life into GrandCentral, a service that lets all your phones respond to one number.
lead_paragraph: If Google search revolutionized the Web, and Gmail revolutionized free e-mail, then one thing’s for sure: Google Voice, unveiled Thursday, will revolutionize telephones.

headline.main: One Number to Ring Them All
headline.print_headline: One Number To Ring Them All
